name: Social Media Manager
description:
So you've decided to be a social media manager, huh? Good for you! Now try to complete this game without crying. But even if you do cry, the silver lining is that you get to take a mental health day. 

Take care of yourself and your wellbeing, don't let people yelling on the internet get you down.

This game is a WIP and will be updated with further scenarios.
